name: Imoonity
description:
This game was originally intended as an entry for the Github Game Off 2020. We decided to miss that submission deadline, and instead work on the game with a bit less time pressure.
You can access the source  code in this Github repository.
You need to enable cookies to save your progress while you play.
Can be played with computer keyboard and will not work in mobile browsers.
